name: N-{4-[(1E)-3-Oxo-3-phenylprop-1-en-1-yl]phenyl}acetamide
source: Karthikeyan M.; Glen R.C.; Bender A. General melting point prediction based on a diverse compound dataset and artificial neural networks. J. Chem. Inf. Model.; 2005; 45(3); 581-1087
Reason: 1-ethyl-4-methylenepiperidine moiety may both add roughly +20 each due to adding more rigid ring structures and making the molecule more compact; The phenyl group introduces a rigid structure and additional molecular weight, estimated at +20; The oxo group introduces additional rigidity, estimated at +5; The methylene bridge introduces additional rigidity, estimated at +2; The prop-1-en-1-yl group introduces additional rigidity, estimated at +5.
